sentence.Network_cn: 她为下层贫困民众的福利而努力.

entry.def: Underprivileged people have less money and fewer possessions and opportunities than other people in their society.

example.ex: ...helping underprivileged children to learn to read.
example.tran: 帮助贫困儿童读书识字

example.ex: ...the hideous effects of government cuts on underprivileged families.
example.tran: 政府削减支出给贫困家庭带来的巨大影响

means.word_mean: 1. lacking the rights and advantages of other members of society
